attributes.long-description:
Put your puzzle-solving abilities to the test with this fantastic bundle from LOOT Interactive!

Included are four awesome strategy games:
Q*Bert: Rebooted (PS4™, PS3™, and “PS Vita”), Whispering Willows (PS4™ and “PS Vita”), Back to Bed (PS4™, PS3™, and “PS Vita”), and Fluster Cluck (PS4™).

Also included are 5 Dynamic Themes for PS4™:
Q*bert: Rebooted Dynamic PS4™ Theme, Q*bert: Rebooted The Mummy Theme, Whispering Willows Dynamic Theme, Whispering Willows Halloween Dynamic Theme, Back to Bed Dynamic Theme

'Q*Bert: Rebooted:
1 Player
HD Video Output: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
Dual Analog Sticks

Whispering Willows:
1 player
700MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output

Back to Bed:
1 Player
DUALSHOCK®4
Interconnectivity PS4™ • PS Vita
HD Video Output: 720p, 1080i, 1080p

Fluster Cluck:
2-4 players
1GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output'

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Published by LOOT™ Interactive, LLC. Q*Bert: Rebooted TM & © 2015 Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Whispering Willows © 2015 Night Light Interactive, All Rights Reserved. Back to Bed © 2015 Bedtime Digital Games, All Rights Reserved. FLUSTER CLUCK™ ©2014 LOOT™ Interactive.
attributes.name: LOOT™ Strategy-Packed Bundle
